file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 33-50-12-04 - CONFIG-2 - FLOOR PROXIMITY STRIP LIGHTS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL FLOOR PROXIMITY STRIP LIGHTS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 1. General A. This section gives the procedures for the removal/installation of the floor proximity strip lights. B. The emergency floor lights are installed on the passenger cabin floor. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY FOR AIRCRAFT WITH ELECTROLUMINES- FLOOR PROXIMITY STRIP LIGHTS - RE- 33-50-12-000-801-A CENT FLOOR-PROX- MOVAL IMITY STRIP LIGHTS FOR AIRCRAFT WITH ELECTROLUMINES- FLOOR PROXIMITY STRIP LIGHT - IN- 33-50-12-400-801-A CENT FLOOR-PROX- STALLATION IMITY STRIP LIGHTS FOR AIRCRAFT WITH PHOTOLUMINESCENT PHOTOLUMINESCENT FLOOR-PROXIMI- 33-50-12-000-802-A FLOOR-PROXIMITY TY STRIP LIGHT - REMOVAL STRIP LIGHTS FOR AIRCRAFT WITH PHOTOLUMINESCENT PHOTOLUMINESCENT FLOOR-PROXIMI- 33-50-12-400-802-A FLOOR-PROXIMITY TY STRIP LIGHT - INSTALLATION STRIP LIGHTS ACFT MODEL(S) FLOOR SIDEWALL ASSEMBLY - REMOV- 33-50-12-000-803-A EMB-135 AL ACFT MODEL(S) FLOOR SIDEWALL ASSEMBLY - INSTAL- 33-50-12-400-803-A EMB-135 LATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General CONFIG-2 33-50-12 Page 1 of 14 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-50-12-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH ELECTROLUMINESCENT FLOOR-PROXIMITY STRIP LIGHTS 2. FLOOR PROXIMITY STRIP LIGHTS - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives procedures for the removal of the emergency floor lights. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Performs the Task Passenger Cabin H. Removal of the Emergency Floor Lights (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-021-C EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH ELECTROLUMINESCENT FLOOR-PROXIMITY STRIP LIGHTS (1) Remove the floor light cover assembly (1). (2) Remove the removable splice (2). (3) Remove the strip light assemblies (3). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-2 33-50-12 Page 2 of 14 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH ELECTROLUMINESCENT FLOOR-PROXIMITY STRIP LIGHTS Emergency Floor Lights - Removal/Installation Figure 401 F A ZONES 231/232 241/242 251/252 2. REMOVABLE 261/262 SPLICE E B 3. STRIP LIGHT ASSEMBLY (WITH ARROWS) C DET. A 1. FLOOR LIGHT D DET. B COVER ASSY 2. REMOVABLE SPLICE 3. STRIP LIGHT ASSEMBLY DET. C FLOOR SIDEWALL FLOOR ASSEMBLY SIDEWALL (REF) RAMP (REF) AFT L.H. CORNER EXTRUSION (REF) DET. E FLOOR SIDEWALL ASSEMBLY (REF) DET. D DET. F 145AMM330802A.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-2 33-50-12 Page 3 of 14 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-50-12-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH ELECTROLUMINESCENT FLOOR-PROXIMITY STRIP LIGHTS 3. FLOOR PROXIMITY STRIP LIGHT - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives procedures for the installation of the emergency floor lights. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Performs the task Passenger cabin H. Installation of the Emergency Floor Lights (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-021-C EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH ELECTROLUMINESCENT FLOOR-PROXIMITY STRIP LIGHTS (1) Install the strip light assemblies (3). NOTE: When you install the strip light assemblies, make sure that the arrows point in the flight direction. (2) Install the removable splice (2). (3) Install the floor light cover assembly (1). I. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-015-C (1) Test the operation of the emergency strip light at the attendant control panel (switch NORM/ON). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 CONFIG-2 33-50-12 Page 4 of 14 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-50-12-000-802-A EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH PHOTOLUMINESCENT FLOOR-PROXIMITY STRIP LIGHTS 4. PHOTOLUMINESCENT FLOOR-PROXIMITY STRIP LIGHT - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to remove the Photoluminescent Floor-Proximity Strip Lights. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 231 Passenger cabin 241 Passenger cabin 242 Passenger cabin 251 Passenger cabin 252 Passenger cabin 261 Passenger cabin 262 Passenger cabin C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin H. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-022-B EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH PHOTOLUMINESCENT FLOOR-PROXIMITY STRIP LIGHTS (1) Remove the Photoluminescent Strip Light (1) from the floor panel with the aid of a spatula or an equivalent object that does not cause damage to the casing. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 CONFIG-2 33-50-12 Page 5 of 14 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

PHOTOLUMINESCENT SEAT TRACK DET. A STRIP LIGHT COVER (REF.) 2. ADHESIVE TAPE CARPET (REF.) C C VIEW C FLOOR PANEL TYPICAL (REF.) DET. B PHOTOLUMINESCENT STRIP LIGHT (SEGMENT) 145AMM330543.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 CONFIG-2 33-50-12 Page 6 of 14 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-50-12-400-802-A EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH PHOTOLUMINESCENT FLOOR-PROXIMITY STRIP LIGHTS 5. PHOTOLUMINESCENT FLOOR-PROXIMITY STRIP LIGHT - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedure for the installation of the Photoluminescent Floor-Proximity Strip Light. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 33-50-12-100-801-A/700 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) 12 mm width, 3M Scotch No. 137 or equiva- Double-sided adhesive tape AR lent G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-015-B EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH PHOTOLUMINESCENT FLOOR-PROXIMITY STRIP LIGHTS (1) Clean the Photoluminescent Strip Light top covers (AMM TASK 33-50-12-100-801-A/ 700). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-802-A/400 CONFIG-2 33-50-12 Page 7 of 14 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-022-B EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH PHOTOLUMINESCENT FLOOR-PROXIMITY STRIP LIGHTS (1) Remove the protective film from the adhesive tape (2). (2) Apply the adhesive tape (2), with its protective film on the back side, to the Photoluminescent Floor-Proximity Strip Light. (3) Cut the adhesive tape (2) to the correct dimensions of the Photoluminescent Floor- Proximity Strip Light. (4) Remove the other side of the protective film from the adhesive tape (2). (5) Install the Photoluminescent Strip Light on the floor panel. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-802-A/400 CONFIG-2 33-50-12 Page 8 of 14 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-50-12-000-803-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 6. FLOOR SIDEWALL ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives procedures for the removal of the floor sidewall assembly. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 33-50-12-000-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 33-50-12-000-802-A/400 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Performs the Task Passenger Cabin I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-014-B (1) For aircraft with floor proximity strip light remove the strip lights (AMM TASK 33-50-12-000-801-A/400), as applicable. (2) For aircraft with photoluminescent floor proximity strip light remove the strip lights (AMM TASK 33-50-12-000-802-A/400), as applicable. J. Removal of the Floor Sidewall Assembly (Figure 403) SUBTASK 020-023-B (1) For aircraft with floor sidewall assemblies attached with screws and washers (a) Remove the floor sidewall assemblies (2) with the screws (3) and the washers (4). (b) Remove the floor sidewall ramp (5) with the screws (6) and the washers (7). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-803-A/400 CONFIG-2 33-50-12 Page 9 of 14 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (c) Remove the FWD corner extrusion (8) with the screws (9) and the washers (10). (d) Remove the aft left hand corner extrusion (11) with the screws (12) and the washers (13). (e) Remove the right hand aft corner extrusion (14) with the screws (15) and the washers (16). (f) Remove the floor sidewall assemblies (17) with the screws (18) and the washers (19). (2) For aircraft with floor sidewall assemblies attached with adhesive tape (a) Remove the floor sidewall assemblies (2) with the adhesive tape(1). (b) Remove the floor sidewall ramp (5) with the screws (6) and the washers (7). (c) Remove the FWD corner extrusion (8) with the screws (9) and the washers (10). (d) Remove the aft left hand corner extrusion (11) with the screws (12) and the washers (13). (e) Remove the right hand aft corner extrusion (14) with the screws (15) and the washers (16). (f) Remove the floor sidewall assemblies (17) with the screws (18) and the washers (19). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-803-A/400 CONFIG-2 33-50-12 Page 10 of 14 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

FWD CORNER 17. FLOOR SIDEWALL EXTRUSION ASSY 18. SCREW 19. WASHER 9. SCREW 10. WASHER 5. FLOOR SIDEWALL RAMP 6. SCREW DET. C 7. WASHER DET. FLOOR SIDEWALL DET. D ASSEMBLY 2 3. SCREW 4. WASHER DET. E 2. FLOOR SIDEWALL ASSEMBLY 11. AFT L.H. 1 CORNER EXTRUSION 1. ADHESIVE TAPE 12. SCREW 13. WASHER DET. F 1 FOR AIRCRAFT WITH FLOOR SIDEWALL ASSEMBLIES ATTACHED WITH ADHESIVE TAPE 2 FOR AIRCRAFT WITH FLOOR SIDEWALL ASSEMBLIES ATTACHED EM145AMM330805B.DGN WITH SCREWS AND WASHERS EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-803-A/400 CONFIG-2 33-50-12 Page 12 of 14 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-50-12-400-803-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 7. FLOOR SIDEWALL ASSEMBLY - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives procedures for the installation of the floor sidewall assembly. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 33-50-12-400-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 33-50-12-400-802-A/400 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Performs the task Passenger cabin I. Installation of the Floor Sidewall Assembly (Figure 402) SUBTASK 420-023-B (1) Install the floor sidewall assemblies (17) with the screws (18) and the washers (19). (2) Install the right hand aft corner extrusion (14) with the screws (15) and the washers (16). (3) Install the aft left hand corner extrusion (11) with the screws (12) and the washers (13). (4) Install the FWD corner extrusion (8) with the screws (9) and the washers (10). (5) Install the floor sidewall ramp (5) with the screws (6) and the washers (7). (6) For aircraft with floor sidewall assemblies attached with screws and washers • Install the floor sidewall assembly (2) with the screws (3) and the washers (4). (7) For aircraft with floor sidewall assemblies attached with adhesive tape EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-803-A/400 CONFIG-2 33-50-12 Page 13 of 14 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL • Install the floor sidewall assemblies (2) with the adhesive tape (1). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-016-B (1) Install the floor proximity strip light (AMM TASK 33-50-12-400-801-A/400), as applicable. (2) Install the photoluminescent floor proximity strip light (AMM TASK 33-50-12-400-802- A/400), as applicable. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-803-A/400 CONFIG-2 33-50-12 Page 14 of 14 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
